summary: In 1960, a military test pilot is caught in a time warp that propels him to year 2024 where he finds a plague has sterilized the world's population.
cast: Robert Clarke|Darlene Tompkins|Arianne Ulmer|Vladimir Sokoloff|Stephen Bekassy|John Van Dreelen|Boyd 'Red' Morgan|Ken Knox|Don Flournoy|Tom Ravick|Neil Fletcher|Jack Herman|James 'Ike' Altgens|William Shephard|John Loughney|Russ Marker|Arthur C. Pierce|Malcolm Thompson
title: Beyond the Time Barrier
